mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, nickname, password, profile_img, email_id, email_domain, join_date, authorities_id) values (#{userId}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{profileImg}, #{emailId}, #{emailDomain}, now(), #{authoritiesId})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, nickname, profile_img from user where user_id=#{userId} and password=#{password}
select user_id, nickname from user where user_id=#{userId}
select user_id as userId, nickname, email_id as emailId, email_domain as emailDomain, profile_img as profileImg from user where user_id=#{userId}
